00019 #ifndef SONCHANNELINFO_H
00020 #define SONCHANNELINFO_H
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <fstream>
00024 #include <stdint.h>
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 class SONFile;
00029 
00033 class SONChannelInfo
00034 {
00035         friend class SONExtractor;
00036         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& out,const SONChannelInfo& channelInfo);
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00043                 static const int fileHeaderSize;
00047                 static const int channelHeaderSize;
00051                 static const int diskBlock;
00052 
00053                 enum
00054                 {
00055                         Off=0,          // the channel is OFF
00056                         ADC,                    // 16-bit waveform
00057                         EventFall,      // events (falling edges)
00058                         EventRise,      // events (rising edges)
00059                         EventBoth,      // events (either)
00060                         Marker,         // events + four 8-bit keys
00061                         ADCMark,                // markers + ADC data
00062                         RealMark,       // markers + float numbers
00063                         TextMark,       // markers + text
00064                         RealWave                // float waveform
00065                 };
00066 
00067         public:
00072         SONChannelInfo();
00078         SONChannelInfo(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel);
00082                 virtual ~SONChannelInfo();
00088         virtual inline void init(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel);
00092                 virtual void read();
00096                 virtual inline bool isEmpty() const;
00101                 virtual inline uint32_t getNBlocks() const;
00106                 virtual inline int64_t getFirstBlockOffset() const;
00111                 virtual inline uint16_t getNSamplesPerWaveform() const;
00116                 virtual inline int32_t getLChanDvd() const;
00121                 virtual inline float getRate() const;
00126                 virtual inline uint16_t getDivide() const;
00131                 virtual inline bool isADCChannel() const;
00136                 virtual inline bool isADCMarkChannel() const;
00141                 virtual inline bool isEventChannel() const;
00146                 virtual inline bool isSimpleEventChannel() const;
00151                 virtual inline bool isMarkerChannel() const;
00156                 virtual inline bool isTextMarkChannel() const;
00157 
00158         private:
00159 
00160                 SONFile                 *file;
00161                 int                             channel;
00162                 uint16_t                        delSize;
00163                 int32_t                 nextDelBlock;
00164                 int32_t                 fBlockOffset;
00165                 int64_t                 firstBlockOffset;
00166                 int32_t                 lBlockOffset;
00167                 int64_t                 lastBlockOffset;
00168                 uint16_t                        nBlocksLSW;
00169                 int16_t                 nBlocksMSW;
00170                 uint32_t                        nBlocks;
00171                 uint16_t                        nExtra;
00172                 int16_t                 preTrig;
00173                 uint16_t                        phySz;
00174                 uint16_t                        maxData;
00175                 char                            comment[71+1];
00176                 int32_t                 maxChanTime;
00177                 int32_t                 lChanDvd;
00178                 int16_t                 phyChan;
00179                 char                            title[9+1];
00180                 float                           idealRate;
00181                 char                            kind;
00182                 char                            pad;
00183                 union
00184                 {
00185                         struct
00186                         {
00187                                 float                   scale;
00188                                 float                   offset;
00189                                 char                    units[5+1];
00190                                 uint16_t                divide;
00191                         } adc;
00192                         struct
00193                         {
00194                                 bool                    initLow;
00195                                 bool                    nextLow;
00196                         } event;
00197                         struct
00198                         {
00199                                 float                   min;
00200                                 float                   max;
00201                                 char                    units[5+1];
00202                         } real;
00203                 } v;
00204 };
00205 
00206 void SONChannelInfo::init(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel)
00207 {
00208         this->file = file;
00209         this->channel = channel;
00210 }
00211 
00212 bool SONChannelInfo::isEmpty() const
00213 {
00214         return firstBlockOffset == -1;
00215 }
00216 
00217 uint32_t SONChannelInfo::getNBlocks() const
00218 {
00219         // This takes into account differences between file format versions (pre vs post 9)
00220         return nBlocks;
00221 }
00222 
00223 int64_t SONChannelInfo::getFirstBlockOffset() const
00224 {
00225         // This takes into account differences between file format versions (pre vs post 9)
00226         return firstBlockOffset;
00227 }
00228 
00229 int32_t SONChannelInfo::getLChanDvd() const
00230 {
00231         return lChanDvd;
00232 }
00233 
00234 float SONChannelInfo::getRate() const
00235 {
00236         return idealRate;
00237 }
00238 
00239 uint16_t SONChannelInfo::getDivide() const
00240 {
00241         return v.adc.divide;
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool SONChannelInfo::isADCChannel() const
00245 {
00246         return kind == ADC;
00247 }
00248 
00249 bool SONChannelInfo::isADCMarkChannel() const
00250 {
00251         return kind == ADCMark;
00252 }
00253 
00254 bool SONChannelInfo::isEventChannel() const
00255 {
00256         return kind == EventFall || kind == EventRise || kind == EventBoth || kind == Marker || kind == TextMark;
00257 }
00258 
00259 bool SONChannelInfo::isSimpleEventChannel() const
00260 {
00261         return kind == EventFall || kind == EventRise || kind == EventBoth;
00262 }
00263 
00264 bool SONChannelInfo::isMarkerChannel() const
00265 {
00266         return kind == Marker;
00267 }
00268 
00269 bool SONChannelInfo::isTextMarkChannel() const
00270 {
00271         return kind == TextMark;
00272 }
00273 
00274 uint16_t SONChannelInfo::getNSamplesPerWaveform() const
00275 {
00276         return nExtra/sizeof(uint16_t);
00277 }
00278 
00279 #endif
